articles.title: Russian Doll season 2 is coming April 20th - The Verge
articles.description: The second season of Netflix’s Russian Doll series is slated to drop just in time for this year’s 4/20. What a completely coincidental concept.

articles.title: Kusama's 'One With Eternity' Hirshhorn Exhibit Opens In April - DCist
articles.description: Yayoi Kusama's wildly popular Infinity Mirror rooms return to the Smithsonian's Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden this spring.
